unnormalised: Hey folks! Training regimens are intense, no? Remember Geeta Phogat's training in Haryana? She pushed HARD. My cousin, Dr. Sharma, recommends HIIT. He says 30 minutes is enough if you're consistent. Also, proper recovery matters! Don't be like Ravi, going straight to parathas after a 10 km run! Focus on nutrition & maybe invest in a small home gym, say 100 sq ft? You can find good deals, even under Rs. 10,000!
normalised: Hey folks! Training regimens are intense, no? Remember Geeta Phogat's training in Haryana? She pushed H A R D. My cousin, Doctor Sharma, recommends H I I T. He says thirty minutes is enough if you're consistent. Also, proper recovery matters! Don't be like Ravi, going straight to parathas after a ten kilometer run! Focus on nutrition and maybe invest in a small home gym, say one hundred square feet? You can find good deals, even under rupee ten thousand!
